item.title: Reading Notes for SwiftUI and Combine Programming (1)
item.description: I start reading onevcat new book SwiftUI and Combine Programming (a great book to learning SwiftUI if you can read Chinese). I decided to put all the interest parts and notes in here. First things First We always need to import the dependency first 1 2 import SwiftUI import Combine Layout all the views in the body 1 2 3 var body: some View { /// Layout your view here } some View is a new concept introduced in Swift 5.
